description.value:
The Patron you choose lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

The Undead
Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMessage000]{Message}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBane000000]{Bane}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFalseLife0]{False Life}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.mycojDbHOZg2luJc]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.F2efriniToiMPjfv]{Phantasmal Force}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.h9LQINMfNhtKdfi3]{Phantom Steed}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.1YC9ZKgPOv0oCbTH]{Speak with Dead}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.OnYKg4boLKhXpmlX]{Death Ward}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.T7WVjD10HKfI4VfV]{Greater Invisibility}
